answers.answer: Hello.Looking at the shaking hands and the numbness together, I suspect some problem 9piched nerve) at the spinal cord level. Please consult a neurologist and get an MRI of the cervical spine done.Your age also goes with a possible case of diabetes, as far as the numbness is concerned. But this is a distant possibility.Do your hands shake when you want to hold something or even when they are free ?Regards

question: i have recently noticed that my hands have began to shake.  also just these past couple of days i feel like my pinky fingers are numb.  what could this be caused by?  I am 40 yrs old
title: lu
